This course was structured in a very unique way compared to any other C programming course I have ever come across because of the approach and the flow in which we have gone through in the course. I never expected any course to flow this manner. Enhance42 has helped me to learn C from basics in depth, and the instructors are never in a hurry to skip any topics. I highly recommend this course to anyone who is interested in learning the C language.

The online bridge course about coding was like a bridge to a new world for me. I had always been interested in coding, but I didn't know where to start. This course gave me the foundation I needed to learn how to code and it opened up a whole new world of possibilities for me.

I actually enjoyed learning because Rohini sir is very cheerful and also very helpful. These online classes didn't feel like the boring classes from COVID but actually enjoyed every moment. I would like to give a very big thank you to you.
It is the best course I have ever seen right now, and it is very useful to me to code computer language. I have gained the knowledge of how to make a computer know what we want to do.

I was totally new to C, and this did a great job in initializing my journey in coding. It was taken up gradually from zero in a way that was easy to comprehend. The regular doubts sessions, constant monitoring, and reviewing of the problems and taking care that we are not getting stuck are awesome!

The course was amazing because the teacher made the class interesting and interactive. So we actively involved in learning. And Rohini sir's team was always available to help and created a supportive environment. It was a great experience.

Teaching method is great. The trainer is explaining every concept from basic(brief) until students get understand. At the end of the program, I got confidence that I can write a program after necessary practicing.
